name: TestBox
description:
Test Box is a rage platformer  where you play as a box and your task is to beat 5 levels with some dangerous things in them.

This is my first game that i am posting on itch.io , I will accept any criticism about it.

I apologize for not having any music in game, I couldn't make any by myself and couldn't find any on sites with royalty free music.

Also i am still learning English, due to that i might have some grammar or punctuation mistakes.
